item.name: Shifts to Parentheses
item.appendix: Shifts, when pressed alone, type parentheses. When used with other keys they're normal shifts.

item.name: Restore [Shift-]Opt-(Left/Right)
item.appendix: The Unicode Hex Input keyboard layout disables these keys for some reason.
item.autogen:
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_OPTION | VK_SHIFT,
KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_OPTION,
KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_OPTION | VK_SHIFT,
KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_OPTION,
KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: RCtrl to C-F12
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, KeyCode::F12, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CONTROL_R
